input_args.passage: "David Wells | David Wells, On May 17, 1998, David Wells of the New York Yankees pitched the 15th perfect game in Major League Baseball history and the second in team history. Pitching against the Minnesota Twins at Yankee Stadium in The Bronx in front of 49,820 fans in attendance, Wells retired all 27 batters he faced., David Wells\nDavid Wells' perfect game | On May 17, 1998, David Wells of the New York Yankees pitched the 15th perfect game in Major League Baseball history and the second in team history."
input_args.claim: 'Next, we look at and, where we find out that David Wells of the New York Yankees pitched a perfect game on May 17, 1998.'
